messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

expense report approval action required expense report approval for hello please reassign below more for can perform change best regards manager sent monday october action required expense report approval for access task application or take direct action using links actions approve reject request more info expense report approval for details assigned date task number report period report total approximately submission date purpose trip expense items taxi taxi requires your approval task cost center original receipt required imaged receipt required itemized per diem vat out requires your approval task cost center original receipt required imaged receipt required itemized taxi taxi requires your approval task cost center original receipt required imaged receipt required itemized comments data display data display recent similar expense date amount taxi taxi taxi recurring violations violation type occurrences data display recent returned reports expense report number submission date report total data display unapplied advances status due date balance unapplied unapplied total unapplied balance

I've ruled out "Hardware," "Storage," and "Purchase" as irrelevant, and "Miscellaneous" seems too broad. "HR Support" still appears to be the most accurate category.
